title: 3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Home with Workshop/storage
posting_body: Quiet home at the end of a private road with a playfield and few homes nearby, and away from road traffic and noise.
It has a master bedroom with an adjoining full bathroom and walk-in closet, the other two bedrooms are at the opposite end of the house by a second full bathroom.
The bedrooms are carpeted while the rest of the home has new plank flooring.
The workshop is near several parking places and can also be used as a storage area.
It is in the Issaquah school district and not far from Issaquah and closer to the Renton Highlands.
It has an adjacent home that can share some utilities to lower the cost of needed services with metering to assure you only pay what you owe.
This is a one-year lease with First and Last Months rent + refundable deposit needed by the move-in date.
If you'd like more information please write me with some information about yourself or situation and I can send pictures I'll be taking this weekend.
